items.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
items.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

items.title: This company wants to be the first to mine the ocean floor, with Trump's help
items.description: The Metals Company is applying for permission from the Trump administration to mine for nickel and cobalt beneath a remote patch of the Pacific Ocean....

items.title: In effort to protect children, France bans smoking at parks and beaches
items.description: Smokers are no longer allowed to light up in public parks, at swimming pools, or at beaches, or "anywhere children may be present," said French health...

items.title: 80 years later, a Holocaust survivor meets an American soldier who helped free him
